metadata.title: CVE-2015-8366 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Array index error in smal_decode_segment function in LibRaw before 0.17.1 allows context-dependent attackers to cause memory errors and possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to indexes.

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.28-2').
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
libraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
